title: Mary Shelley's Frankenstein
creator_contributor_role: Japan. National Tourist Organisation, production company
subject_group: Literature/English literature - Film and video adaptations
description: At the dawn of the 19th Century, inspired by genius and driven by madness, Victor Frankenstein's quest for immortality creates an unspeakable terror. Frankenstein is one of the most famous and chilling epic tales. The power and spirit of Mary Shelley's profound Gothic legend is brought to life in this terrifying, passionate and haunting cinematic masterpiece. An electrifying, full-blooded love story starring Robert De Niro (Creature), Kenneth Branagh (Victor Frankenstein), Tom Hulce (Henry), Helena Bonham Carter (Elizabeth) and Aidan Quinn (Walton). Co-starring John Cleese (Professor Waldman), Ian Holm (Victor's father) and Richard Briers (Grandfather).
